title: A Wireless Mouse with Unlimited Power!!! - Razer Hyperflux
description: Dave2D review of the Razer Mamba HyperFlux. Razer is setting the bar with their best wireless gaming mouse that charges itself on the mousepad. Razer Mamba HyperFlux -   Razers new HyperFlux Wireless Power Technology is a great step forward for gaming hardware. Gamers now have access to a wireless mouse that doesnt contain a battery for an smooth ultra-lightweight gaming experience. Having the Razer Mamba on a Firefly HyperFlux mousepad will keep it charged indefinitely with wireless power. The combination of a 16,000 DPI 5G optical sensor with swappable hard and soft mouse pad texture is awesome.
